100.TalentDes$chinese: 施放专精技能时可获得3点刀意。
100.TalentDes$english: Gain 3 points of Blade Intent when releasing Expertise.

101.TalentDes$chinese: 每<style="accent-gn">8</style>点敏捷提供<style="accent-gn">1</style>点物理攻击力。

102.TalentDes$chinese: 看破斩可使超高出力获得1层充能。

103.TalentDes$chinese: 普通攻击造成伤害时有10%固定几率触发看破斩，每1秒最多生效一次。
103.TalentDes$english: Normal attacks have a fixed 10% chance to trigger Piercing Slash, effective at most once per second.

104.TalentDes$chinese: 看破斩的固定触发几率+10%。
104.TalentDes$english: Fixed trigger chance of Piercing Slash +10%.

105.TalentDes$chinese:
居合斩暴击+10%。
居合斩暴击超出60%的部分，每1%提供1%的暴击伤害。
105.TalentDes$english:
Crit rate of Iaido Slash +10%.
For every 1% exceeding 60% Crit rate, provide 1% Crit DMG.

106.TalentDes$chinese: 以任何方式获取的暴击属性提升12%，但是以任何方式获取的幸运属性都降低10%。
106.TalentDes$english: Critical attributes obtained in any way are +12%, but luck attributes obtained in any way are -10%.

107.TalentDes$chinese: 特殊攻击触发暴击获得100刀意。
107.TalentDes$english: Special attacks triggering Crits gain 100 Blade Intent.

109.TalentDes$chinese:
消耗100点刀意获得雷返印记，当雷返印记叠加满5层时，施放居合斩可获得雷返效果，同时清除雷返印记。
雷返：获得10%雷元素加成，持续15秒。
109.TalentDes$english:
Consume 100 Blade Intent to gain a Thunder Reversal Mark. When the Thunder Reversal Mark stacks to 5 layers, Casting Iaido Slash grants the Thunder Reversal effect and clears the Thunder Reversal Mark.
Thunder Reversal: Gain 10% Thunder Elemental Bonus, lasts for 15s.

110.TalentDes$chinese:
每次施放一闪、飞雷神叠加1层雷压，当雷压积蓄满5层时，居合斩派生为雷切。
施放雷切后消耗5层雷压，雷压最多可叠加8层。
110.TalentDes$english:
Each time Flash or Raijin Dash is cast, stack 1 layer of Thundrage. When Thundrage accumulates to 5 layers, Iaido Slash evolves into Thunder Cut.
After Casting Thunder Cut, consume 5 layers of Thundrage, Thundrage can stack up to 8 layers.

112.TalentDes$chinese: 居合斩暴击时有10%固定几率重置一闪、飞雷神剩余冷却时间，每消耗1枚雷之印几率+10%。
112.TalentDes$english: When Iaido Slash critically hits, 10% chance to reset the remaining CD time of Flash or Raijin Dash, with an additional 10% chance for each Thunder Sigil consumed.

113.TalentDes$chinese:
每施放3次超高出力后的下一次居合斩在前方形成一个刃风界域。
刃风界域每造成一次伤害，极诣·大破灭连斩剩余冷却时间缩减1.5秒。
113.TalentDes$english:
After Casting Overdrive three times, the next Iaido Slash forms a Bladewind Domain in front.
Each time the Bladewind Domain deals damage, the remaining CD time of Oblivion Combo -1.5s.

114.TalentDes$chinese:
月刃触发幸运一击时，有30%固定几率施放雷击。
月刃可自主移动攻击敌方目标。
114.TalentDes$english:
When Moon Blade triggers a Lucky Strike, there is a 30% fixed chance to cast Thunder Strike.
Moon Blade can autonomously move to attack enemy targets.

115.TalentDes$chinese: 月刃触发幸运一击时，有30%固定几率回复1枚雷之印，每1秒最多生效一次。
115.TalentDes$english: When Moon Blade triggers a Lucky Strike, there is a 30% fixed chance to restore 1 Thunder Sigil, effective once per second.

116.TalentDes$chinese: 霹雳连斩触发幸运一击时延长月刃1秒持续时间。
116.TalentDes$english: When Thundercut triggers a Lucky Strike, it extends Moon Blade's duration by 1s.

120.TalentDes$chinese:
自身每造成10次伤害，触发雷之力。
雷之力：雷元素攻击+10，持续10秒，最多叠加10层。
120.TalentDes$english:
Every 10 hits, trigger Thunder Power.
Thunder Power: Thunder Elemental Attack +10, lasts 10s, stacks up to 10 times.

121.TalentDes$chinese:
刀意上限+25。
在一次连续的霹雳连斩中，每第5次会施展强力的一记霹雳升龙斩，造成更高伤害。
121.TalentDes$english:
Blade Intent limit +25.
During a continuous Thundercut, every 5th strike will perform a powerful Thundercleave, dealing higher damage.

122.TalentDes$chinese: 千雷闪影之意持续期间，月刃攻击速度+100%。
122.TalentDes$english: During Stormflash, Moon Blade attack speed +100%.

123.TalentDes$chinese:
特殊攻击造成伤害时为敌方目标施加雷咒。
雷咒：每层雷咒使敌方目标受到自身的伤害+2%，持续10秒，最多叠加4层。
123.TalentDes$english:
When Special Attacks deal damage, apply Thunder Curse to the enemy target.
Thunder Curse: Each stack of Thunder Curse increases the damage the enemy target takes by 2%, lasts 10s, stacks up to 4 times.

124.TalentDes$chinese: 对生命值80%以上敌方目标造成伤害时，物理伤害+20%。
124.TalentDes$english: When dealing damage to enemy targets with more than 80% HP, Attack Damage +20%.

126.TalentDes$chinese: 击败敌方目标时触发雷爆，每3秒最多生效一次。
126.TalentDes$english: When defeating an enemy target, trigger Thunder Explosion, can only occur once every 3s.

128.TalentDes$chinese: 自身3米内每有1个敌方目标，忽视物理防御+3%，最高15%（精英及以上目标效果翻倍）。
128.TalentDes$english: For each enemy target within 3 meters, Armor Penetration +3%, up to a maximum of 15% (effect doubled for elite and above targets).

129.TalentDes$chinese: 雷之印大于3（包含3）时施放特殊攻击，会连续攻击2次。
129.TalentDes$english: When Thunder Sigil is greater than or equal to 3, Special Attacks will attack twice consecutively.

130.TalentDes$chinese:
继续增强使用居合斩的能力。
居合斩消耗的雷之印数量等于5时，居合斩伤害+10%且居合斩施放期间霸体。
130.TalentDes$english:
Further enhance the ability to use Iaido Slash.
When the number of Thunder Sigils consumed by Iaido Slash equals 5, Iaido Slash damage +10% and grants super armor during its execution.

131.TalentDes$chinese: 霹雳连斩必定获得1枚电荷之种。

132.TalentDes$chinese:
施放居合斩时触发锐击，每10秒最多生效一次。
锐击：一闪暴击+10%，如果一闪暴击，获得3枚雷之印，持续10秒。
132.TalentDes$english:
When Casting Iaido Slash, it triggers Sharp Strike, effective once every 10s.
Sharp Strike: Flash Crit +10%, if Flash Crits, gain 3 Thunder Sigils for 10s.

133.TalentDes$chinese: 技能每多消耗1枚雷之印，伤害+3%。
133.TalentDes$english: For each additional Thunder Sigil consumed by a skill, damage +3%.

134.TalentDes$chinese: 极诣·大破灭连斩最后一击强化为终极一斩。
134.TalentDes$english: The final strike of Oblivion Combo is enhanced to Ultimate Slash.

137.TalentDes$chinese: 敏捷达到500点时，暴击伤害、幸运伤害+5%。
137.TalentDes$english: When Agility reaches 500 points, Crit DMG and Lucky Damage +5%.

138.TalentDes$chinese: 专精技能每消耗1枚雷之印，额外获得3点刀意。
138.TalentDes$english: For each Thunder Sigil consumed by a Expertise Skill, gain an additional 3 points of Blade Intent.

139.TalentDes$chinese: 每消耗5枚雷之印，无穷雷霆之力剩余冷却时间缩减0.5秒。
139.TalentDes$english: For every 5 Thunder Sigils consumed, the remaining CD time of Volt Surge -0.5s.

140.TalentDes$chinese: 消耗雷之印时有几率返还1枚雷之印，每多消耗1枚雷之印返还几率+8%。
140.TalentDes$english: When consuming Thunder Sigils, there is a chance to return 1 Thunder Sigil. For each additional Thunder Sigil consumed, the return chance +8%.

141.TalentDes$chinese: 开启无穷雷霆之力，一闪、飞雷神派生为坠龙闪、神影斩。
141.TalentDes$english: Activate Volt Surge, Flash and Raijin Dash derive into Dracoflash and Phantom Slash.

142.TalentDes$chinese:
飞雷神无视目标物理防御。
飞雷神每多命中1个目标，伤害+10%。
142.TalentDes$english:
Raijin Dash ignores target's Armor.
For each additional target hit by Raijin Dash, damage +10%.

144.TalentDes$chinese: 以任何方式获取的暴击属性提升12%，但是以任何方式获取的幸运属性都降低10%。
144.TalentDes$english: Critical attributes obtained in any way are +12%, but luck attributes obtained in any way are -10%.

145.TalentDes$chinese: 刀意大于等于100时一闪、飞雷神暴击+10%。
145.TalentDes$english: When Blade Intent is greater than or equal to 100, One Flash and Raijin Dash Crit +10%.

146.TalentDes$chinese: 专精技能、特殊攻击造成伤害时每多消耗1枚雷之印，获得1%雷元素加成。
146.TalentDes$english: When dealing damage with Expertise and special attacks, for each additional Thunder Sigil consumed, gain 1% Thunder Element bonus.

147.TalentDes$chinese: 每次施放坠龙闪、神影斩叠加5层雷压，雷压最多可叠加8层。
147.TalentDes$english: Each time Dracoflash and Phantom Slash are cast, gains 5 stacks of Thundrage, up to a maximum of 8 layers.

149.TalentDes$chinese: 居合斩造成暴击伤害时，当前刀意如果大于20点，触发雷击（每次居合斩最多触发一次）。
149.TalentDes$english: When Iaido Slash deals Crit DMG, if the Blade Intent is greater than 20 points, trigger Thunder Strike (Iaido Slash can trigger only once per use).

151.TalentDes$chinese: 居合斩造成暴击伤害时，忽视目标30%物理防御。
151.TalentDes$english: When Iaido Slash deals Crit DMG, ignore 30% of the target's Armor.

153.TalentDes$chinese: 瞬发居合斩命中目标使目标物理防御降低6%，持续5秒，最多叠加5层。
153.TalentDes$english: Instant Iaido Slash hitting the target reduces the target's Armor by 6% for 5s, stacking up to 5 layers.

155.TalentDes$chinese: 雷霆之镰消耗的电荷之种数量-3。
155.TalentDes$english: Number of Charge Seeds consumed by Thunder Scythe -3.

156.TalentDes$chinese: 每1%急速提供1%刀意回复速度。
156.TalentDes$english: Each 1% Haste provides 1% Blade Intent recovery speed.

157.TalentDes$chinese:
特殊攻击替换为月影，并增强使用该技能的能力。
施放月影，获得30刀意。

频繁消耗雷之印，召唤月刃持续的攻击目标。高额的急速，能让月刃的攻击加快；高额的幸运，能让月刃更加频繁的触发雷击。
157.TalentDes$english:
Replace Special Attack with Moonstrike, enhancing the ability.
Cast Moonstrike to gain 30 Blade Intent.

Frequent consumption of Thunder Sigils summons Moon Blade to continuously attack the target. High Haste accelerates Moon Blade's attacks. High Luck increases the frequency of Moon Blade triggering Thunder Strike.

158.TalentDes$chinese:
每施放7次雷霆之镰触发神罚之镰。
神罚之镰必定暴击。
158.TalentDes$english:
Every 7 casts of Thunder Scythe trigger Divine Punishment Scythe.
Divine Punishment Scythe is guaranteed to critically hit.

159.TalentDes$chinese: 月刃触发幸运一击时有30%固定几率，获得1枚电荷之种。
159.TalentDes$english: When Moon Blade , 30% chance to gain 1 Charge Seed.

161.TalentDes$chinese: 每触发2次雷击，千雷闪影之意剩余冷却时间缩减0.5秒。
161.TalentDes$english: For every 2 Thunder Strikes triggered, reduce the remaining CD time of Stormflash by 0.5s.

162.TalentDes$chinese: 开启千雷闪影之意，月影派生为缭乱兜割。
162.TalentDes$english: Activating Stormflash transforms Moonstrike into Chaos Breaker.

163.TalentDes$chinese:
雷击伤害+20%。
每1%幸运提供1%雷击伤害加成。
163.TalentDes$english:
Lightning damage +20%.
Each 1% Luck provides 1% Lightning damage bonus.

164.TalentDes$chinese: 每参与击败1个敌方目标，获得1个电荷之种。
164.TalentDes$english: Gain 1 Charge Seed for each enemy target defeated.

165.TalentDes$chinese: 雷击获得50%雷元素加成，但是雷击无法造成暴击伤害。
165.TalentDes$english: Lightning strikes gain 50% Thunder Element bonus, but cannot deal Crit DMG.

166.TalentDes$chinese: 当刀意大于等于50时，月影必定暴击。
166.TalentDes$english: When Blade Intent is greater than or equal to 50, Moonstrike is guaranteed to crit.

167.TalentDes$chinese:
雷之印上限+1。
雷霆之镰、神罚之镰必定触发看破斩。
167.TalentDes$english:
Lightning Sigil limit +1.
Storm Scythe and Divine Sickle are guaranteed to trigger Piercing Slash.

169.TalentDes$chinese: 霹雳连斩触发幸运一击时，获得1枚电荷之种。
169.TalentDes$english: When lightning storm Combo triggers a Lucky Strike, gain 1 Charge Seed.

170.TalentDes$chinese: 月刃每隔6秒触发1次回旋伤害。每2%急速缩短其1%触发间隔。
170.TalentDes$english: Moon Blade triggers a spinning damage every 6s. Each 2% Haste reduces its trigger interval by 1%.

171.TalentDes$chinese: 千雷闪影之意持续期间雷霆之镰会连续触发2次。
171.TalentDes$english: During Stormflash, Storm Scythe will activate twice in succession.

172.TalentDes$chinese: 无穷雷霆之力持续期间，雷印回溯的返还几率翻倍，但是期间雷之印对消耗雷之印的技能伤害增加效果从25%变为10%。
172.TalentDes$english: During Volt Surge, the return chance of Thunder Sigil Rewind doubles, but the damage bonus of skills that consume Thunder Sigil is reduced from 25% to 10%.

200.TalentDes$chinese:
寒冰能量上限+10。
冰霜之矛伤害+12%。

201.TalentDes$chinese: 每<style="accent-gn">10</style>点智力提供<style="accent-gn">1</style>点魔法攻击力。
201.TalentDes$english: Every <style="accent-gn">10</style> points of Intellect provides <style="accent-gn">1</style> point of MATK.

202.TalentDes$chinese: 特殊攻击造成伤害时有5%固定几率为目标施加冰冻。
202.TalentDes$english: When Special Attacks deal damage, 5% chance to apply Frozen to the target.

203.TalentDes$chinese:
获得2个常驻的冰晶核心悬浮在身旁。
冰晶核心
普通攻击造成伤害时，冰晶核心有10%固定几率施放2支冰箭。
冰箭：对敌方目标造成50%攻击力魔法伤害，同时获得1枚玄冰，玄冰最多存储2枚。
203.TalentDes$english:
Gain 2 permanent Ice Crystal Cores floating around you.
Ice Crystal Core
When normal attacks deal damage, Ice Crystal Core has a fixed 10% chance to cast 2 Ice Arrows.
Ice Arrow: Deals 50% ATK Magic Damage to enemy targets and gains 1 Frost, up to a maximum of 2 Frosts.

206.TalentDes$chinese: 施放寒冰射线时，可同时引导施放浪潮汇聚。
206.TalentDes$english: When Casting Frostbeam, you can channel and cast Tidepool.

207.TalentDes$chinese: 寒冰射线造成伤害时有10%固定几率使冰晶核心施放冰箭。
207.TalentDes$english: When Frostbeam deals damage, it has a fixed 10% chance to make Ice Crystal Core cast Ice Arrow.

208.TalentDes$chinese: 冰晶核心施放的冰箭可额外造成一次100%攻击力魔法伤害，且该伤害为范围伤害。
208.TalentDes$english: Ice Arrows cast by Ice Crystal Core can deal an additional 100% ATK Magic Damage, and this damage is area damage.

210.TalentDes$chinese: 水之涡流寒冰能量回复效率+200%。

211.TalentDes$chinese:
冻结寒风命中目标时（命中多个目标时只触发一次）扣除所有玄冰召唤冰晶坠落，冰晶坠落数量等于扣除的玄冰数量。
冰晶坠落造成伤害，回复5点寒冰能量，且接下来5秒内技能消耗的寒冰能量-5%，最多叠加4层。
211.TalentDes$english:
When Frozen Gale hits a target (only triggers once when hitting multiple targets), it consumes all Frosts to summon Ice Crystal Fall, with the number of Ice Crystal Falls equal to the consumed Frosts.
Ice Crystal Fall deals damage, recovers 5 Ice Energy, and reduces the Ice Energy cost of skills by 5% for the next 5s, stacking up to 4 times.

212.TalentDes$chinese:
特殊攻击替换为寒冰射线，并增强使用该技能的能力。
每拥有一个玄冰使得寒冰射线伤害+15%同时消耗的寒冰能量+30%。

持续消耗寒冰能量引导寒冰射线打击目标。高额的急速和精通，可使得射线引导更快同时强化寒冰能量的回复。
212.TalentDes$english:
Replace Special Attack with Frostbeam, enhancing its effectiveness.
Each possessed Frost Crystal increases Frostbeam DMG by 15% and Ice Energy consumption by 30%.

Continuously consumes Ice Energy to maintain Frostbeam against targets. High Haste and Mastery result in faster beam channeling and superior Ice Energy recovery.

214.TalentDes$chinese: 每消耗50寒冰能量，缩减清滝绕珠剩余冷却时间1秒。
214.TalentDes$english: For every 50 Ice Energy consumed, reduce the remaining CD time of Crystal Veil by 1s.

215.TalentDes$chinese: 消耗玄冰的冰霜之矛触发暴击或幸运一击时，有50%固定几率召唤冰霜彗星。
215.TalentDes$english: When Frost Lance that consumes Frost triggers a crit or Lucky Strike, it has a fixed 50% chance to summon Frost Comet.

216.TalentDes$chinese: 冰霜之矛同时触发暴击和幸运一击时，使得陨星风暴立即冷却。
216.TalentDes$english: When Frost Lance triggers both a Crit and a Lucky Strike, Meteor Storm's CD is immediately reset.

217.TalentDes$chinese: 施放寒冰风暴后的8秒内，冰霜之矛可额外对目标附近的另外一个目标发射冰霜之矛。
217.TalentDes$english: For 8s after Casting Blizzard, Frost Lance can additionally fire at another target near the original target.

219.TalentDes$chinese: 清滝绕珠造成伤害时有固定几率缩减寒冰风暴1秒剩余冷却时间，几率等同于你幸运%的一半。
219.TalentDes$english: When Crystal Veil deals damage, it has a fixed chance to reduce the remaining CD time of Blizzard by 1s, with the chance equal to half of your Luck%.

220.TalentDes$chinese: 陨星风暴造成伤害时使得冰晶核心施放冰箭（单次陨星风暴最多生效一次）。
220.TalentDes$english: When Meteor Storm deals damage, it makes Ice Crystal Core cast Ice Arrow (Meteor Storm can only trigger this effect once per instance).

221.TalentDes$chinese:
累计消耗15个玄冰之后，接下来10秒内施放的寒冰风暴得到强化。
寒冰风暴：免除吟唱过程，伤害+50%。
221.TalentDes$english:
After consuming 15 Frost Crystals, the next Blizzard cast within 10s is enhanced.
Blizzard: No Casting time, damage +50%.

222.TalentDes$chinese: 每施放15次冰霜之矛，向前方发射一支贯穿冰矛。
222.TalentDes$english: Every 15 Frost Lances cast, a piercing ice spear is launched forward.

223.TalentDes$chinese: 冰元素技能对精英及以上目标伤害+8%。
223.TalentDes$english: Ice skills deal +8% damage to elite and above targets.

224.TalentDes$chinese:
造成伤害时，触发涓流。
涓流：获得1%冰元素加成，持续6秒，最高5层。
224.TalentDes$english:
When dealing damage, trigger Trickle.
Trickle: Gain 1% Ice bonus, lasts for 6s, up to 5 stacks.

225.TalentDes$chinese:
每消耗50寒冰能量可获得1枚玄冰。
玄冰上限+3。
225.TalentDes$english:
Every 50 Ice Energy consumed grants 1 Frost Crystal.
Frost Crystal cap +3.

226.TalentDes$chinese: 专精技能、终极技能触发幸运一击时，有30%固定几率触发冰霜冲击。每3秒最多生效一次。
226.TalentDes$english: When a Expertise Skill or Ultimate triggers a Lucky Strike, there is a 30% fixed chance to trigger Frost Shock. This effect can occur once every 3s.

227.TalentDes$chinese: 专精技能、终极技能对冰冻目标造成伤害时，触发冰霜冲击，每1秒最多生效一次。
227.TalentDes$english: When a Expertise Skill or Ultimate deals damage to a frozen target, trigger Frost Shock, can occur once every 1s.

228.TalentDes$chinese: 专精技能、终极技能每多命中一个目标（最多不超过5），精通或急速或暴击或幸运+2%（以当前最高属性为准），持续5秒。
228.TalentDes$english: For each additional target hit by Expertise or Ultimates (up to 5), mastery or haste or critical or luck +2% (based on the highest attribute), lasts for 5s.

229.TalentDes$chinese: 每消耗35点寒冰能量缩减陨星风暴、冻结寒风1秒剩余冷却时间。
229.TalentDes$english: Every 35 Ice Energy consumed reduces the remaining CD of Meteor Storm and Frozen Gale by 1s.

230.TalentDes$chinese:

458.TalentDes$english: During Wind Fury, Falcon Toss derives into Azure Sever once.

龙卷风伤害+30%。

501.TalentDes$english: Every <style="accent-gn">10</style> points of Intellect provides <style="accent-gn">1</style> point of MATK.

503.TalentDes$chinese:
施放特殊攻击时获得1个再生蓓蕾。

再生蓓蕾：初始上限4个。
专精技能、终极技能施加治疗时，消耗2个再生蓓蕾抛出一个滋养之种，每1秒最多生效一次。

Casting a Special Attack grants 1 Regen Bud.

When an Expertise Skill or Ultimate generates healing, 2 Regen Buds are consumed to throw a Nourishing Seed, triggering up to once per second.
When an Expertise Skill or Ultimate deals DMG, 2 Regen Buds are consumed to shoot a Wild Seed, occurring up to once per second.

504.TalentDes$english: Increases the cap of Regen Buds by 4.

狂野绽放施加治疗时，同时为受治疗目标施加自然护盾。
拥有自然护盾的目标受到攻击时回复生命值，回复的生命值为你攻击力的10%，每1秒最多生效一次。

Targets with Nature Shield restore HP when hit, with the amount equal to 10% of your ATK. This effect can occur up to once per second.

狂野绽放现在可充能2次。

Symbiotic Mark: All of your DMG will heal allies with Symbiotic Mark for 20% of the DMG dealt, lasting for 10s.

Wild Seed inflicts Thorn on the targets hit.

560.TalentDes$chinese: 施放盛放注能不再消耗再生蓓蕾。
560.TalentDes$english: Casting Blossom Charge no longer consumes Regen Buds.

561.TalentDes$chinese: 施放生命绽放使得接下来4秒内生命绽放治疗量+20%，能量消耗+10%，最多叠加5层。

562.TalentDes$chinese: 加速生长持续期间，能量回复速度+50%。
562.TalentDes$english: During Growth Arcane, energy recovery speed +50%.

563.TalentDes$chinese: 滋养每治疗自身200次，获得超然。
563.TalentDes$english: For every 200 self-heals from Nourish, gain Transcendence.

566.TalentDes$english: Every 45s, generate 1 Flower Stalk in the order of Crimson True Sight, Golden Devotion, Moonlight Solace.

567.TalentDes$chinese: 当有花株生成时，每2秒获得1个再生蓓蕾，持续8秒。

569.TalentDes$chinese:
能量上限+20。

571.TalentDes$english: After casting Life Bloom 10 times, the next Grove Wish or Regen Pulse within 15s has a Cast Speed of +100% and healing of +10%.

900.TalentDes$english: For 8s after you use Tectonic Ring, each Basic Attack pulls a target within 20 meters and at least 8 meters away toward you. The same target cannot be pulled again within 3s.

902.TalentDes$english: Gains the effects of Suppress Expertise.

903.TalentDes$chinese: 普通攻击造成伤害时有10%固定几率触发一次弱点打击。
903.TalentDes$english: When dealing DMG, Basic Attacks have a fixed 10% chance to trigger Weak Point Strike.

904.TalentDes$chinese: 弱点打击的固定触发几率+10%。
904.TalentDes$english: Increases the fixed chance to trigger Weak Point Strike by 10%.

906.TalentDes$chinese:
格挡成功回复自身2%生命和3怒气，每1秒最多生效一次。
触发幸运格挡时，回复自身6%生命和10怒气，每1秒最多生效一次。
906.TalentDes$english:
Successful Block restores 2% HP and 3 Rage, once per second.
On Lucky Block, restore 6% HP and 10 Rage, once per second.

907.TalentDes$chinese:
格挡成功触发格挡反击，每1秒最多生效一次。
触发幸运格挡时，触发强化格挡反击，每1秒最多生效一次。
907.TalentDes$english:
Successful Block triggers Countercrush, once per second.
On Lucky Block, trigger Enhanced Countercrush, once per second.

砂岩之握冷却时间-15秒。
施放砂岩之握后获得格挡冲击效果。
911.TalentDes$english:
Reduces the CD of Sandstone Grasp by 15s.
After using Sandgrip, gains Countercrush.

913.TalentDes$chinese: 勇者壁垒期间，格挡几率翻倍。
913.TalentDes$english: During Brave Bastion, doubles the Block chance.

914.TalentDes$chinese: 护盾猛击命中目标使得目标对自身造成伤害降低3%，持续10秒，最多叠加3层。
914.TalentDes$english: Successful hit of Shield Bash reduces the DMG targets deal to you by 3% for 10s, stacking up to 3 times.

916.TalentDes$chinese: 处于护盾状态时，在空中施放普通攻击会猛烈下砸，将自身护盾引爆，对周围目标造成自身30%最大生命值伤害，每30秒最多生效一次。
916.TalentDes$english: While shielded, use Basic Attack midair to slam down, detonating the Shield and dealing DMG equal to 30% max HP to nearby enemies. Once every 30s.

917.TalentDes$chinese: 护盾猛击施加的护盾值+30%。
917.TalentDes$english: Increases the effectiveness of Shield granted by Shield Bash by 30%.

918.TalentDes$chinese: 巨岩躯体状态下，每获得20点怒气，触发砂之庇护。
918.TalentDes$english: During Stoneform, gains Sandy Shelter for every 20 Rage accumulated.

919.TalentDes$chinese: 普通攻击造成伤害时有5%固定几率触发护盾连击。每1%精通附加0.2%触发概率。
919.TalentDes$english: Basic Attacks have a fixed 5% chance to trigger Shield Combo. Each 1% Mastery adds 0.2% to the trigger chance.

920.TalentDes$chinese: 每消耗1枚砂晶石，缩减巨岩躯体1秒剩余冷却时间。
920.TalentDes$english: Consumes 1 Sand Crystal to reduce the CD of Stoneform by 1s.

921.TalentDes$chinese: 护盾状态下，受到魔法伤害-25%，受到风元素攻击伤害-50%。
921.TalentDes$english: While shielded, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% and Wind DMG taken by 50%.

922.TalentDes$chinese: 在砂石斗篷持续期间，对自身添加护盾触发护盾回声。
922.TalentDes$english: During Sandshroud, gaining a shield triggers Shield Echo.

923.TalentDes$chinese:
岩怒之击造成伤害时，有20%几率使你的普通攻击派生为怒击，每2%幸运附加1%触发几率。
怒击施放后格挡减伤+10%，持续10秒。
923.TalentDes$english:
When dealing DMG, Granite Fury has a 20% chance to allow your next Basic Attack to evolve into Rageblow. Each 2% Luck adds 1% chance.
After using Rageblow, increases Block DMG Reduction by 10% for 10s.

924.TalentDes$chinese: 受到精英及以上目标伤害-12%。
924.TalentDes$english: Reduces the DMG Elites or stronger enemies deal to you by 12%.

925.TalentDes$chinese: 生命值低于30%时，触发绝境逢生，每60秒最多生效一次。
925.TalentDes$english: When HP falls below 30%, trigger Survival Instinct. Once every 60s.

926.TalentDes$chinese: 自身3米内每有1个敌方目标，格挡几率+3%，最高15%（精英及以上目标效果翻倍）。
926.TalentDes$english: Each enemy within 3 meters increases Block chance by 3%, up to 15%. (Doubles the effect against Elite or stronger enemies.)

927.TalentDes$chinese: 激怒状态下，物理防御+30%，每秒扣除5%。
927.TalentDes$english: During Enraged, increases Armor by 30%, yet it loses 5% per second.

928.TalentDes$chinese: 自身3米内每有一个敌方目标，压制效果+3%，最高15%（精英及以上目标效果翻倍）。
928.TalentDes$english: Each enemy within 3 meters enhances Suppress effect by 3%, up to 15%. (Doubles the effect against Elite or stronger enemies.)

929.TalentDes$chinese: 消耗怒气时有几率使自身激怒，每消耗1怒气提供1%几率。
929.TalentDes$english: Consuming Rage has a chance to trigger Enraged. Each 1 Rage consumed grants 1% chance.

930.TalentDes$chinese:
特殊攻击更换为格挡冲击，并增强使用该技能的能力。
触发幸运格挡可格挡减伤+10%。

尽可能保持格挡冲击的覆盖，格挡冲击下受到的部分伤害会被格挡抵消掉，高额的幸运能让格挡时附加各种收益。
930.TalentDes$english:
Replaces Special Attack with Countercrush, and enhances the ability.
When Lucky Block triggers, increases Block DMG Reduction by 10%.

Try to keep Countercrush active as much as possible. While it's active, part of incoming DMG can be blocked. High Luck allows parry to yield various buffs.

931.TalentDes$chinese:
继续增强使用护盾猛击的能力。
护盾猛击每多命中1个敌方目标伤害+30%，最高+150%。
931.TalentDes$english:
Further enhances Shield Bash.
Each additional enemy hit increases the DMG deal by Shield Bash by 30%, up to 150%.

932.TalentDes$chinese: 岩御·崩裂回环衍生出一块持续5秒的沙石区域。
932.TalentDes$english: Tectonic Ring generates a Sandfield that lasts 5s.

933.TalentDes$chinese: 怒击造成伤害时，使勇者壁垒冷却时间缩减3秒。
933.TalentDes$english: When Rageblow deals DMG, reduces the CD of Brave Bastion by 3s.

934.TalentDes$chinese: 勇者壁垒状态下，施放格挡冲击、岩怒之击时触发砂晶石震荡。
934.TalentDes$english: During Brave Bastion, using Countercrush or Granite Fury triggers a Sand Crystal Shock.

935.TalentDes$chinese: 格挡成功，有30%固定几率使得下一次施放岩怒之击不消耗砂晶石，每3秒最多生效一次。
935.TalentDes$english: A successful Block grants you a fixed 30% chance that your next Granite Fury won't consume Sand Crystal. Once every 3s.

937.TalentDes$chinese: 激怒状态下，压制效果翻倍。
937.TalentDes$english: In enraged state, Suppress effect is doubled.

939.TalentDes$chinese: 每消耗1枚砂晶石，回复1%最大生命值。
939.TalentDes$english: For every Sand Crystal consumed, recover 1% of Max HP.

941.TalentDes$chinese:
怒爆充能次数+1。
激怒状态下，怒爆变为瞬发。
941.TalentDes$english:
Rage Burst charge +1.
While Enraged, Rage Burst becomes instant cast.

942.TalentDes$chinese: 碎星冲伤害+30%，且必定获得激怒。
942.TalentDes$english: Star Shatter damage +30%, and always gains enraged.

943.TalentDes$chinese:
砂石斗篷持续期间，受到攻击时使自身5米范围内敌方目标攻击速度降低30%，持续3秒。
砂石斗篷持续期间，自身8米范围内友方物理防御+10%。
943.TalentDes$english:
throughout the duration of Sandshroud, being attacked reduces the attack speed of enemy targets within 5 meters by 30%, lasting for 3s.
throughout the duration of Sandshroud, Armor of friendly targets within 8 meters +10%.

944.TalentDes$chinese: 普通攻击造成伤害时，有10%固定几率触发岩盾倍增，每30秒最多生效一次。
944.TalentDes$english: When normal attacks deal damage, 10% chance to trigger Rock Shield, this effect can occur once every 30s.

945.TalentDes$chinese: 巨岩躯体持续期间受到所有伤害-10%。
945.TalentDes$english: throughout the duration of Stoneform, all damage received -10%.

护盾强度+10%。
当处于砂石斗篷期间时，护盾强度+20%。

947.TalentDes$english: Expertise and special attacks increase strength by 2% for 5s for each target hit, stacking up to 10 layers. When having 10 layers, Expertise heal for 20% of the damage dealt and remove the stack effect.

948.TalentDes$english: For every 20 Sand Crystals consumed, Star Shatter evolves into Starfall.

949.TalentDes$chinese:
施放碎星崩裂后，获得岩之主。
岩之主：15秒内，普通攻击派生为1次崩裂，怒爆派生为1次地崩山摧。
949.TalentDes$english:
After Casting Starfall, gain Rock Master.
Rock Master: For 15s, normal attacks evolve into 1 Arcane, and Rage Burst evolves into 1 Terra Sunder.

950.TalentDes$chinese: 碎星冲击败目标时，碎星冲立即冷却。
950.TalentDes$english: When Star Shatter defeats a target, Star Shatter immediately cools down.

951.TalentDes$chinese: 激怒状态下，崩裂必定触发弱点打击。
951.TalentDes$english: In Enraged state, Arcane is guaranteed to trigger Weak Point Strike.

952.TalentDes$chinese: 碎星冲对当前生命值低于等于35%的目标伤害+100%。
952.TalentDes$english: Star Shatter deals +100% damage to targets with HP less than or equal to 35%.

953.TalentDes$chinese:
每激怒7次，获得岩之主。
岩之主：15秒内，普通攻击派生为1次崩裂，怒爆派生为1次地崩山摧。
953.TalentDes$english:
For every 7 Enrages, gain Rock Master.
Rock Master: For 15s, normal attacks evolve into 1 Arcane, and Rage Burst evolves into 1 Terra Sunder.

954.TalentDes$chinese: 战斗状态下，每5秒回复1%最大生命值。
954.TalentDes$english: In combat state, recover 1% of max HP every 5s.

955.TalentDes$chinese:
物理防御+300。
地崩山摧额外对目标造成一次物理伤害，伤害值等于200%物理防御。
955.TalentDes$english:
Armor +300.
Terra Sunder additionally deals Attack Damage to the target equal to 200% of Armor.

956.TalentDes$chinese: 勇者壁垒持续期间岩怒之击、格挡冲击伤害+30%。
956.TalentDes$english: During Brave Bastion, Granite Fury and Countercrush damage +30%.

957.TalentDes$chinese: 触发幸运格挡时，本次格挡伤害减免+30%。
957.TalentDes$english: When triggering Lucky Block, Defense for this block +30%.

958.TalentDes$chinese: 格挡可对魔法伤害生效。
958.TalentDes$english: Block can be effective against Magic Damage.

959.TalentDes$chinese:
每施放5次岩怒之击，获得岩之心。
岩之心：10秒内，岩怒之击派生为巨岩轰击。
959.TalentDes$english:
After Casting Granite Fury 5 times, gain Rock Heart.
Rock Heart: For 10s, Granite Fury evolves into Stone Fist.

960.TalentDes$chinese: 施放巨岩轰击后，接下来6秒时间内，每2秒召唤1记岩弹。
960.TalentDes$english: After Casting Stone Fist, summon 1 Granite every 2s for the next 6s.

961.TalentDes$chinese: 每产生50点怒气，召唤1记岩弹。
961.TalentDes$english: For every 50 Rage generated, summon 1 Granite.

962.TalentDes$chinese: 巨岩轰击为你回复5%最大生命值，每额外击中1个敌方目标，回复效果+2%，最终回复量不超过15%。溢出的回复值转化为等额护盾。
962.TalentDes$english: Stone Fist restores 5% of max HP, with an additional 2% restoration for each extra enemy hit, up to a maximum of 15%. Excess restoration converts into an equivalent shield.

963.TalentDes$chinese: 勇者壁垒持续期间受到伤害，格挡反击、强化格挡反击伤害+10%，持续10秒，最多叠加10层。
963.TalentDes$english: During Brave Bastion, when taking damage, Block Counter and Enhanced Block Counter damage +10%, lasting for 10s, stacking up to 10 layers.

965.TalentDes$chinese: 岩弹有几率额外召唤1记岩弹，其几率等于幸运几率。
965.TalentDes$english: Granite has a chance to summon an additional Granite, with the chance equal to Lucky Chance.

966.TalentDes$chinese: 岩弹命中目标使其接下来5秒内对我造成的所有伤害-10%。
966.TalentDes$english: Granite hitting a target reduces all damage dealt to me by that target by -10% for the next 5s.

967.TalentDes$chinese:
每召唤20记岩弹，获得岩之心。
岩之心：10秒内，岩怒之击派生为巨岩轰击。
967.TalentDes$english:
Every 20 Granites summoned grants a Heart of Rock.
Heart of Rock: For 10s, Granite Fury transforms into Stone Fist.

968.TalentDes$chinese: 施放岩御·崩裂回环后的10秒内，每2秒触发1次强化格挡反击。
968.TalentDes$english: For 10s after Casting Tectonic Ring, triggers Enhanced Block Counter every 2s.

969.TalentDes$chinese:
幸运几率+5%。
格挡反击、强化格挡反击必定暴击。
969.TalentDes$english:
Luck chance +5%.
Block Counter and Enhanced Block Counter are guaranteed Crits.

970.TalentDes$chinese:
精通+600。
勇者壁垒持续期间精通+8%。

1100.TalentDes$chinese:
激活驭兽流时，光能上限+20，使光能重铸获得更长的持续时间。
如果激活了驯鹰流，效果修正为：光能上限-20，使自身可以更快的进入光能重铸状态。
1100.TalentDes$english:
When Wildpack Spec is active, increases Max Photon Energy by 20, and extends the duration of Photon Reforge.
If Falconry Spec is active, reduces Max Photon Energy by 20, and enables faster access to Photon Reforge.

1101.TalentDes$english: Every <style="accent-gn">10</style> points of Agility provide <style="accent-gn">2</style> point of Haste.

1102.TalentDes$chinese: 造成伤害时，有30%固定几率对敌方目标施加易伤效果。
1102.TalentDes$english: When dealing damage, there is a 30% fixed chance to apply Vulnerable effect to the enemy target.

1103.TalentDes$chinese:
驯化一只野狼跟随自身战斗，施放暴风箭矢有30%固定几率使其触发协同攻击。

野狼
野狼同你一起协同作战。
普通攻击：对敌方目标进行横扫，造成50%攻击力物理伤害，跟随普通攻击技能升级/进阶进行成长。
协同攻击：野狼立刻扑向目标对其进行撕咬，造成80%攻击力物理伤害，跟随普通攻击技能升级/进阶进行成长。
1103.TalentDes$english:
Tames a Wild Wolf to fight alongside you. Storm Arrow has a 30% fixed chance to trigger Coordinated Attack.

Wild Wolf
Fights alongside you.
Basic Attack: Sweeps the enemy, dealing Attack Damage equal to 50% ATK (which scales with the Level/Tier of your Basic Attack).
Coordinated Attack: Wild Wolf leaps to the enemy and bites, dealing Attack Damage equal to 80% ATK (which scales with the Level/Tier of your Basic Attack).

1104.TalentDes$chinese: 每施放15次特殊攻击，下一次箭雨获得的光能提升100%。
1104.TalentDes$english: Every 15 Special Attacks increases the Photon Energy granted by the next Arrow Rain by 100%.

1105.TalentDes$chinese: 狂野呼唤激活期间，野狼命中目标必定暴击。
1105.TalentDes$english: While Wildcall is active, the Wild Wolf is bound to deal Crit DMG.

1106.TalentDes$chinese: 野狼造成暴击伤害时，使得你和你的宠物急速+2%，持续10秒，最多叠加5层。
1106.TalentDes$english: When the Wild Wolf deals Crit DMG, you and your Companions gain 2% Haste. The effect lasts 10s and stacks up to 5 times.

1107.TalentDes$chinese:
激活驭兽流时，光能重铸状态下每秒损失的光能从25点减少至20点，使光能重铸获得更长的持续时间。
如果激活了驯鹰流，效果修正为：光能每秒回复从2点提升至3点，使根据时间进入光能重铸的速度加快。
1107.TalentDes$english:
When Wildpack Spec is active, reduces Photon Energy drain during Photon Reforge from 25 to 20 per second.
If Falconry Spec is active, increases Photon Energy regain from 2 to 3 per second, speeding up activation of Photon Reforge via time-based mechanics.

1108.TalentDes$chinese:
野狼触发协同攻击时有30%固定几率召唤一只幻影魔狼扑咬当前敌方目标。
扑咬必定附加生命流失，如果目标已经处于生命流失状态扑咬必定暴击。
1108.TalentDes$english:
The Wild Wolf's Coordinated Attack grants a fixed 30% chance to summon a Phantom Direwolves, which pounces on the enemy.
Pounce and Bite always inflicts Bleed. If the target is already bleeding, the pounce is bound to deal Crit DMG.

1109.TalentDes$chinese: 野狼的协同攻击有30%固定几率施加生命流失。
1109.TalentDes$english: The Wild Wolf's Coordinated Attack has a 30% fixed chance to inflict Bleed.

1110.TalentDes$chinese: 战斗状态下，暴风箭矢造成伤害有10%固定几率召唤一只野狼，野狼持续存在8秒，每30秒最多生效一次。
1110.TalentDes$english: When dealing DMG in battle, Storm Arrow has a fixed 10% chance to summon a Wild Wolf for 8s. Once every 30s.

1111.TalentDes$chinese: 光能重铸状态下，野狼的协同攻击忽视目标物理防御。
1111.TalentDes$english: During Photon Reforge, the Wild Wolf's Coordinated Attack ignores the target's Armor.

1112.TalentDes$chinese: 锐眼·光能巨箭额外附带一次光能爆炸，造成1000%攻击力物理伤害（跟随终极大招技能升级/升阶进行成长），同时附带击飞效果。
1112.TalentDes$english: Luminary Bolt generates an additional Photon Explosion, dealing Attack Damage equal to 1,000% ATK (which scales with the Level/Tier of Ultimate), and inflicting Airborne.

1114.TalentDes$chinese: 光能重铸期间暴风箭矢射出额外光追箭矢，场上每有1只宠物射出1支。
1114.TalentDes$english: During Photon Reforge, for each Companion in battle, Storm Arrow fires 1 Lightseeker Arrow.

1115.TalentDes$chinese: 精神凝聚持续时间延长3秒。
1115.TalentDes$english: Extends the duration of Focus by 3s.

1116.TalentDes$chinese:
猎鹰施放闪电冲击时可触发迅捷。
迅捷：攻击速度+10%，持续8秒，最多叠加3层。
1116.TalentDes$english:
Applies Swiftness to Falcon when using Lightning Strike.
Swiftness: Increases Attack SPD by 10%. The effect lasts 8s and stacks up to 3 times.

1118.TalentDes$chinese: 二连矢每暴击3次，猎鹰立刻发动闪电冲击。
1118.TalentDes$english: Every 3 Crit hits with Double Arrow allows the Falcon to instantly perform Lightning Strike.

1119.TalentDes$chinese:
猎鹰出击时有30%固定几率获得一层弱点瞄准。
施放光意·四连矢时在空中留下光能裂隙，光能裂隙消耗当前弱点瞄准层数发射光能箭矢，对目标造成80%攻击力物理伤害。
1119.TalentDes$english:
When the Falcon strikes, grants you a fixed 30% chance to gain 1 stack of Weak Point Aim.
Using Quadraflare leaves behind a Radiance Rift midair. The Rift consumes the stacks of Weak Point Aim to fire Photon Arrows, each dealing Attack Damage equal to 80% ATK.

1121.TalentDes$chinese: 猎鹰忽视目标20%物理防御。
1121.TalentDes$english: The Falcon ignores 20% of the targets' Armor.

1122.TalentDes$chinese:
每1%暴击提供0.3%暴击伤害。
二连矢暴击时，回复2点光能。
1122.TalentDes$english:
Every 1% critical rate grants 0.3% Crit DMG.
Crit hits of Double Arrow grants 2 Photon Energy.

1123.TalentDes$chinese: 命中1个目标时，3秒内获得1%光元素加成，最高叠加4层。
1123.TalentDes$english: Every target hit grants 1% Light DMG bonus. The effect lasts 3s and stacks up to 4 times.

1124.TalentDes$chinese: 宠物对精英及以上目标伤害+8%。
1124.TalentDes$english: Companions deal 8% more DMG to Elites or stronger enemies.

1125.TalentDes$chinese: 普通攻击造成伤害时，有5%固定几率使得特殊攻击立即获得一次充能，但是不得超过特攻最大充能次数限制。
1125.TalentDes$english: When Basic Attacks deal DMG, there is a 5% fixed chance to instantly grant Special Attack 1 charge, up to the maximum charge limit.

1126.TalentDes$chinese:
继续增强使用暴风箭矢以及与野狼一起战斗的能力。
非光能重铸状态下，施放暴风箭矢有25%固定几率使野兽立即触发协同攻击。光能重铸状态下，触发几率翻倍。
1126.TalentDes$english:
Enhances usage of Storm Arrow and synergy with the Wild Wolf.
When Photon Reforge is not activated, using Storm Arrow grants the Wild Wolf a fixed 25% chance to launch a Coordinated Attack. During Photon Reforge, doubles the chance.

1127.TalentDes$chinese: 普通攻击施放时有20%固定几率对目标周围最多3个敌方目标射出一支箭矢。
1127.TalentDes$english: Basic Attacks grants a 20% fixed chance to fire extra arrows at up to 3 nearby enemies.

1128.TalentDes$chinese: 普通攻击造成伤害时有15%固定几率触发分裂箭矢，每1秒最多生效一次。
1128.TalentDes$english: Basic Attacks gains a fixed 15% chance to generate Split Arrow. Once per second.

1129.TalentDes$chinese:
特殊攻击替换成二连矢，并增强使用该技能的能力。
每秒回复2点光能。
每1%急速提供1%二连矢冷却速度。
可以驯化猎鹰，协助自己进行战斗。

猎鹰始终陪伴自身，当自身职业技能造成暴击伤害时，猎鹰迅速向目标出击，造成自身100%攻击力物理伤害，跟随普通攻击技能升级/进阶进行成长。

猎鹰将响应你的攻击，急速和暴击会加强猎鹰的响应频率，猎鹰习得闪电冲击后伤害得到大额提升。
1129.TalentDes$english:
Replaces Special Attack with Double Arrow, and enhances the ability to use this skill.
Recovers 2 points of Photon Energy per second.
Every 1% haste provides 1% CD Speed Increase for Double Arrow.
Can tame a Falcon to assist in combat.

Falcon always accompanies you. When your Class Skill deals Crit DMG, the Falcon swiftly attacks the target, dealing Attack Damage equal to 150% ATK. Scales with the Level/Tier of Basic Attack.

The Falcon will respond to your attacks. Haste and Crit will enhance the Falcon's action frequency. After the Falcon learns Lightning Strike, its DMG is greatly increased.

1130.TalentDes$chinese:
施放箭雨后，野狼持续施放扫尾，直到箭雨结束。
野狼扫尾，必定暴击，且必定施加生命流失。
1130.TalentDes$english:
After you use Arrow Rain, the Wild Wolf continuously sweeps its tail until the storm ends.
Tail Sweep is bound to deal Crit DMG and inflicts Bleed.

1131.TalentDes$chinese: 普通攻击或特殊攻击造成伤害时，有10%固定几率射出一支爆炸箭矢，每3秒最多生效一次。
1131.TalentDes$english: When dealing DMG, Basic or Special Attacks gain a fixed 10% chance to fire an Explosive Arrow. Once every 3s.

1132.TalentDes$chinese: 每5%急速额外提供1%攻击速度。
1132.TalentDes$english: Every 5% haste provides an additional 1% attack speed.

1134.TalentDes$chinese: 敏捷达到500点时，攻击速度+5%。
1134.TalentDes$english: When agility reaches 500 points, attack speed +5%.

1136.TalentDes$chinese: 光能重铸状态下，野狼暴击伤害+50%。
1136.TalentDes$english: In Light Energy Reforge state, wolf's Crit DMG +50%.

1137.TalentDes$chinese:
宠物伤害+2%。
施放怒涛射击后的5秒内，宠物伤害+10%。
1137.TalentDes$english:
Companion's damage +2%.
Within 5s after Casting Torrent Volley, Companion's damage +10%.

1138.TalentDes$chinese: 每召唤1次野狼或幻影魔狼，箭雨剩余冷却时间缩减0.5秒。
1138.TalentDes$english: Each time a wolf or phantom wolf is summoned, Arrow Rain's remaining CD -0.5s.

1139.TalentDes$chinese: 目标身上每多一个生命流失效果，野狼对其造成的伤害+3%。
1139.TalentDes$english: For each additional bleed effect on the target, the wolf's damage to that target +3%.

1140.TalentDes$chinese: 野狼的协同攻击缩减暴风箭矢1秒剩余冷却时间。
1140.TalentDes$english: The wolf's coordinated attack reduces Storm Arrow's remaining CD by 1s.

1141.TalentDes$chinese: 光追箭矢有50%固定几率对目标施加生命流失。
1141.TalentDes$english: Light Chasing Arrow has a 50% fixed chance to inflict bleed on the target.

1142.TalentDes$chinese: 野狼进化为成年形态，伤害+30%，伤害范围+50%。
1142.TalentDes$english: The wolf evolves into an adult form, damage +30%, damage range +50%.

1143.TalentDes$chinese: 每次施放狂野呼唤，强大的传奇雄鹰或传奇野猪会回应你的呼唤。
1143.TalentDes$english: Each time Wild Call is cast, a powerful legendary eagle or legendary Boarrier will respond to your call.

1144.TalentDes$chinese: 光能重铸状态下，怒涛射击持续充能，30秒充能完成后怒涛射击派生为光意·怒涛射击。
1144.TalentDes$english: In Photon Reforge state, Torrent Volley continuously charges, and after 30s of charging, it evolves into Lumi Torrent.

1145.TalentDes$chinese: 每射出1支光追箭矢，狂野呼唤剩余冷却时间缩减1秒。
1145.TalentDes$english: Each time a Light Chasing Arrow is shot, Wild Call's remaining CD -1s.

1146.TalentDes$chinese: 每2%精通提供1%生命流失伤害。

1148.TalentDes$chinese: 箭雨、光追箭矢必定暴击。
1148.TalentDes$english: Arrow Rain and Light Chasing Arrow are guaranteed to critically hit.

1150.TalentDes$chinese: 魔狼对当前生命值低于等于35%的目标伤害+30%。
1150.TalentDes$english: Damage of the demon wolf to targets with HP less than or equal to 35% increased by 30%.

1151.TalentDes$chinese: 施放狂野呼唤后的10秒内再次施放狂野呼唤，可命令场上的所有宠物立即施放践踏。
1151.TalentDes$english: Within 10s after Casting Wild Call, Casting Wild Call again can command all Companions in combat to immediately cast Trample.

1152.TalentDes$chinese: 你和猎鹰造成暴击伤害时对目标施加1层钢制喙。
1152.TalentDes$english: When you and the falcon deal Crit DMG, apply 1 layer of Steel Beak to the target.

1153.TalentDes$chinese: 每触发5次内爆，召唤一只幻影猎鹰冲向目标。
1153.TalentDes$english: Every 5 triggers of Implosion summon a phantom falcon to rush towards the target.

1154.TalentDes$chinese: 精神凝聚持续期间，每1秒+0.5%暴击、1%暴击伤害，该效果最多叠加12层。
1154.TalentDes$english: throughout the duration of Focus, +0.5% Crit and +1% Crit DMG every second, this effect can stack up to 12 layers.

1155.TalentDes$chinese: 二连矢暴击时缩减爆炸射击、聚能射击1秒剩余冷却时间。
1155.TalentDes$english: When Double Arrow hits critically, reduce the remaining CD time of Blast Shot and Powerdraw by 1s.

1157.TalentDes$chinese:
光能轰炸命中目标对其施加光能凝滞。
光能凝滞：移动速度-30%，被聚能射击命中必定暴击，持续5秒。
1157.TalentDes$english:
Radiance Barragehitting the target applies Light Stasis to it.
Light Stasis: Speed -30%, guaranteed Crit when hit by Powerdraw, lasts for 5s.

1158.TalentDes$chinese: 猎鹰暴击时忽视目标50%物理防御。
1158.TalentDes$english: When the falcon hits critically, ignore 50% of the target's Armor.

1159.TalentDes$chinese: 猎鹰触发协同攻击时，敏捷+20，持续5秒，最多叠加10层。
1159.TalentDes$english: When the falcon triggers Coordinated Attack, agility +20 for 5s, can stack up to 10 layers.

1160.TalentDes$chinese: 精神凝聚持续期间，光能轰炸在目标位置召唤1只天界雄鹰。
1160.TalentDes$english: throughout the duration of Focus, Radiance Barrage summons a celestial eagle at the target's location.

1161.TalentDes$chinese: 光能裂隙发射的箭矢每造成1次伤害，使得下一次爆炸射击伤害+10%，最高不超过100%。
1161.TalentDes$english: Each arrow fired by Radiance Rift that deals damage increases the damage of the next Blast Shot by +10%, up to a maximum of 100%.

1162.TalentDes$chinese:
闪电冲击命中目标触发光棱。
光棱：对周围最多5个敌方目标分别造成100%攻击力造成连锁伤害，同时额外附加3层钢制喙。
1162.TalentDes$english:
Lightning Strike hitting the target triggers Prism.
Prism: Deals chain damage equal to 100% ATK to up to 5 surrounding enemy targets, additionally applies 3 stacks of Steel Beak.

1165.TalentDes$chinese: 聚能射击命中目标施加2层钢制喙，如果暴击则施加5层钢制喙。
1165.TalentDes$english: Powerdraw hitting the target applies 2 stacks of Steel Beak, if it hits critically, applies 5 stacks of Steel Beak.

1166.TalentDes$chinese: 天界雄鹰命中目标时，使得目标钢制喙不会自然扣除。
1166.TalentDes$english: When the celestial eagle hits the target, Steel Beak on the target will not naturally decrease.

1200.TalentDes$chinese: 消耗圣令，使自身进入光铸身躯。每多消耗1枚圣令，添加100%攻击力光明圣盾。
1200.TalentDes$english: Consumes Holy Sigils to activate Lightforged Body. Each additional Holy Sigil consumed grants a Radiant shield equal to 100% ATK.

1201.TalentDes$chinese: 消耗光明能量的技能施放时有15%固定几率使普通攻击派生为断罪。
1201.TalentDes$english: When using a Skill that consumes Photon Energy, gains a 15% fixed chance to allow Basic Attack to evolve into Condemn.

1202.TalentDes$chinese: 消耗圣令的技能施放时有20%固定几率使下一个消耗圣令的技能不消耗圣令。该效果持续8秒，施放消耗圣令的技能后该效果移除。
1202.TalentDes$english: When using a Skill that consumes Holy Sigils, gains a 20% fixed chance to allow the next such Skill does not consume the Sigil. The effect lasts 8s or until a Sigil-consuming Skill is used.

1203.TalentDes$chinese:
施放裁决可触发圣环，触发间隔为30秒。
每消耗1枚圣令，减少1秒剩余间隔时间。
1203.TalentDes$english:
Using Judgment generates a Divine Circle, with a CD of 30s.
Each Holy Sigil consumed reduces the CD by 1s.

1204.TalentDes$chinese: 每消耗20点神圣能量，使得当前光铸身躯获得100%攻击力光明护盾。
1204.TalentDes$english: Every 20 Holy Energy consumed grants Lightforged Body a Light Shield equal to 100% ATK.

1205.TalentDes$chinese: 每1%急速使得圣令回复速度加快1%。
1205.TalentDes$english: Each 1% Haste accelerates the REG SPD of Holy Sigils by 1%.

1207.TalentDes$chinese: 当处在圣环内时，断罪派生为强化断罪，强化断罪在断罪伤害基础上+100%。
1207.TalentDes$english: Within the Divine Circle, Condemn evolves into Enhanced Condemn, dealing 100% more DMG.

1208.TalentDes$chinese:
继续增强使用英勇盾击的能力。
英勇盾击附带光明冲击。
连续施放两次英勇盾击时，光明冲击命中敌方目标会强迫目标攻击自身，同时沉默目标0.5秒。

尽可能的保持英勇盾击带来的物理防御效果，通过高暴击触发炽热清算来获得更多光明能量。光明能量的充足意味着在裁决和灼热裁决的加持下可以源源不断地进行自愈。
1208.TalentDes$english:
Further enhances your use of Valor Bash.
Valor Bash now generates Radiant Impact.
Using Valor Bash twice in succession allows Radiant Impact to force enemies to attack you and silences them for 0.5s.

Maintain the bonus Armor from Valor Bash to perform Inferno Reckon via high critical rate, thus gaining more Photon Energy. Ample Photon Energy allows you to constantly recover HP with Judgment and Scorching Judgment.

1209.TalentDes$chinese:
消耗圣令的技能暴击时额外获得30%光明能量。
消耗光明能量的技能暴击伤害+30%。
1209.TalentDes$english:
Skills that consume Holy Sigils grant 30% more Photon Energy on Crit hits.
Increases the Crit DMG of Skills that consume Photon Energy by 30%.

1210.TalentDes$chinese:
神圣之击暴击时有50%固定几率使你接下来10秒内裁决不消耗光明能量，最多叠加2层。
施放裁决之后该效果层数-1。
1210.TalentDes$english:
When Divine Strike lands a Crit hit, grants a fixed 50% chance that Judgment does not consume Photon Energy. The effect lasts 10s and stacks up to 2 times.
Using Judgment consumes 1 stack.

1211.TalentDes$chinese: 处在圣环内时，英勇盾击物理防御效果+30%。
1211.TalentDes$english: Within the Divine Circle, increases the Armor of Valor Bash by 30%.

1212.TalentDes$chinese:
施放投掷盾牌使得当前光铸身躯获得300%攻击力光明护盾。
投掷盾牌充能次数+1。
1212.TalentDes$english:
Using Shield Toss grants the Lightforged Body a Light Shield equal to 300% ATK.
Increases the charge of Shield Toss by 1.

1213.TalentDes$chinese: 每消耗2枚圣令圣光守卫剩余冷却时间缩减1秒。
1213.TalentDes$english: Every 2 Holy Sigils consumed reduces the CD of Aegis Ward by 1s.

1214.TalentDes$chinese: 投掷盾牌每次造成伤害都有50%固定几率使得当前光铸身躯获得100%攻击力光明护盾。
1214.TalentDes$english: Each time Shield Toss deals DMG, there's a fixed 50% chance to grant the Lightforged Body a Light Shield equal to 100% ATK.

1215.TalentDes$chinese:
圣光守卫持续期间，格挡几率翻倍。
受到攻击时，圣光守卫剩余冷却时间缩减0.2秒，该效果每0.5秒最多生效一次。
1215.TalentDes$english:
While Aegis Ward is active, doubles your Block chance.
When you take DMG, reduces Aegis Ward's CD by 0.2s. Once every 0.5s.

1216.TalentDes$chinese:
每施放10次裁决，下一次裁决将强化为灼热裁决。
灼热裁决：召唤由圣光构造的巨剑降临目标区域，随后停留5秒，持续对周围敌方目标造成伤害同时附加灼热效果，总计造成600%攻击力物理伤害（跟随裁决技能升级/进阶进行成长）。
灼热：使目标对自身造成的伤害降低3%，持续10秒，最多叠加10层，暴击时添加3层灼热。
1216.TalentDes$english:
Every 10 uses of Judgment allows the next Judgment to evolve into Scorching Judgment.
Scorching Judgment: Summon a holy greatsword to descend upon the target area for 5s, dealing DMG over time to nearby enemies and inflicting Scorch, totally dealing Attack Damage equal to 600% ATK (which scales with the Level/Tier of Judgment).
Scorch: Reduces target's DMG dealt to you by 3% for 10s The effect stacks up to 10 times. Crit hits grant 3 stacks.

1217.TalentDes$chinese: 施放终极技能后留下神圣壁垒，为范围内的友方目标抵挡伤害。神圣壁垒受到自身最大生命值200%的总伤害或持续15秒后消失。
1217.TalentDes$english: After using Ultimate, creates a Holy Barrier, shielding nearby allies from DMG. It lasts for 15s or until it absorbs DMG equal to 200% Max HP.

1218.TalentDes$chinese:
特殊攻击替换成先锋打击，并增强使用该技能的能力。
先锋打击每额外命中1个敌方目标额外获得2点光明能量，最多额外获得10点。
成功格挡掉攻击时，该次攻击不会扣除光铸屏障。

光铸屏障：每层使自身最终生命上限+2%。最多可以拥有10层光铸屏障，受到任何伤害都会消耗1层。持续25秒或所有层数被消耗完为止，每次获得层数时重置持续时间。

光铸屏障可以使得生命值获得大幅成长，结合裁决、冷酷征伐和光明决心针对生命上限进行治疗和减伤的特质达到不俗的生存能力，需要掌控好光铸屏障的监控和扭转时机。
1218.TalentDes$english:
Replaces Special Attack with Vanguard Strike and enhances its power.
Each additional enemy hit by Vanguard Strike grants 2 extra Photon Energy, up to 10.
Successfully Block prevents losing the stacks of Lightforged Barrier.

Lightforged Barrier: Each stack increases Max HP by 2%, up to 10 stacks, with each instance of DMG removing 1 stack. It lasts 25s or until all stacks are consumed. gaining stacks resets the duration.

Managing Lightforged Barrier is crucial for sustaining high HP and triggering self-healing and Defense effects from Judgment, Zeal Crusade, and Radiance.

1220.TalentDes$chinese: 先锋打击造成伤害时有20%固定几率使得接下来5秒内下一个裁决消耗的光明能量降低50%，且裁决必定造成暴击伤害。
1220.TalentDes$english: When Vanguard Strike deals damage, 20% chance that the next Judgment within 5s will consume 50% less Light Energy and will definitely deal Crit DMG.

1221.TalentDes$chinese: 急速带来的圣令回复效果提升100%。
1221.TalentDes$english: The Holy Sigil recovery effect from Haste +100%.

1222.TalentDes$chinese: 每消耗1层光铸屏障，有10%固定几率获得1枚圣令。
1222.TalentDes$english: Each time a stack of Lightforged Barrier is consumed, 10% chance to gain 1 Holy Sigil.

1223.TalentDes$chinese:
圣剑命中敌方目标给目标施加神圣印记。
先锋打击可将该神圣印记扩散给命中的敌方目标。
1223.TalentDes$english:
When Sacred Blade hits an enemy target, it applies a Holy Mark to the target.
Vanguard Strike can spread this Holy Mark to hit enemy targets.

1224.TalentDes$chinese:
对神圣印记目标造成伤害时，伤害的2%转化为自己生命值。
光明决心持续期间，效果提升至4%。
1224.TalentDes$english:
When dealing damage to targets with Holy Mark, 2% of the damage is converted into your own HP.
throughout the duration of Radiance, this effect is increased to 4%.

1225.TalentDes$chinese: 施放光明决心时，自动向周围最多5个敌方目标释放裁决。
1225.TalentDes$english: When casting Radiance, automatically releases Judgment to up to 5 surrounding enemy targets.

1226.TalentDes$chinese: 冷酷征伐持续期间，每秒获得1层光铸屏障同时每消耗1枚圣令，可为冷酷征伐进行1层充能；当充能达到3层时，冷酷征伐向外爆裂，造成200%攻击力物理伤害且必定暴击。
1226.TalentDes$english: During Zeal Crusade, gains 1 stack of Lightforged Barrier per second and each Holy Sigil consumed grants Zeal Crusade 1 charge. When 3 charges are reached, Zeal Crusade explodes outward, dealing 200% Attack Damage and guaranteed Crit DMG.

1227.TalentDes$chinese: 圣环内每有1个敌方目标，圣环伤害+25%，圣环治疗效果+5%。
1227.TalentDes$english: For each enemy target within the Divine Circle, Divine Circle damage +25%, Divine Circle Healing +5%.

1228.TalentDes$chinese: 裁决只命中1个敌方目标时，伤害+25%。
1228.TalentDes$english: When Judgment hits only one enemy target, damage +25%.

1229.TalentDes$chinese: 处于圣环内时，自身受到治疗效果+10%。
1229.TalentDes$english: While within the Divine Circle, self-Healing are +10%.

1230.TalentDes$chinese:
自身生命值百分比高于当前敌方目标时，受到目标伤害降低5%。
自身生命值百分比低于当前敌方目标时，裁决伤害+50%。
1230.TalentDes$english:
When your HP percentage is higher than the enemy target, damage taken from the target -5%.
When your HP percentage is lower than the enemy target, Judgment damage +50%.

1231.TalentDes$chinese: 光铸身躯状态下，获得霸体。
1231.TalentDes$english: Gain Super Armor while in Lightforged Body state.

1232.TalentDes$chinese: 终极技能持续期间，队友造成的威胁值转移给自身。
1232.TalentDes$english: During Ultimate duration, threat generated by Allies is transferred to you.

1233.TalentDes$chinese: 力量达到500点时，最大生命值+12%。
1233.TalentDes$english: When Strength reaches 500 points, Max HP +12%.

1234.TalentDes$english: When Condemn deals damage, immediately cool down 1 Holy Decree (prioritizing the one with the longest remaining CD).

1235.TalentDes$chinese: 专精技能造成暴击治疗时，获得15%治疗加成。
1235.TalentDes$english: When Expertise critically heal, gain 15% healing bonus.

1236.TalentDes$english: Valor Bash can be charged by holding down, then rush forward a certain distance.

1237.TalentDes$english: When Inferno Reckon or Reckoning deals Crit DMG to an enemy target, block chance +5%, lasts for 10s, stacks up to 5 times.

1238.TalentDes$chinese: 圣光守卫持续期间，专精技能造成暴击伤害时，有50%固定几率使得1枚圣令立即冷却（优先冷却剩余时间最长的圣令）。
1238.TalentDes$english: During Aegis Ward duration, when Expertise deal Crit DMG, 50% chance to immediately cool down 1 Holy Decree (prioritizing the one with the longest remaining CD).

1239.TalentDes$chinese: 投掷盾牌、裁决造成伤害时有10%固定几率触发神圣之击，如果造成暴击伤害触发几率提升至30%。
1239.TalentDes$english: When Shield Toss or Judgment deals damage, 10% chance to trigger Holy Strike. If Crit DMG is dealt, trigger chance increases to 30%.

1240.TalentDes$chinese:
圣光守卫持续期间神圣之击触发几率翻倍。
每触发3次神圣之击，圣光守卫持续时间延长1秒。
1240.TalentDes$english:
During Aegis Ward duration, Holy Strike trigger chance is doubled.
Every 3 times Holy Strike is triggered, Aegis Ward duration is extended by 1s.

1241.TalentDes$chinese:
英勇盾击造成暴击伤害时获得炽热。
施放圣光守卫必定获得炽热。

When Valor Bash deals Crit DMG, gain Scorching.
Casting Aegis Ward guarantees Scorching.
Scorching: For 5s, Reckoning evolves into Inferno Reckon. Casting Inferno Reckon reduces Scorching stacks by 1, stacks up to 5 times.

1242.TalentDes$chinese: 光铸身躯状态下，获得12%治疗加成。
1242.TalentDes$english: Gain 12% healing bonus while in Lightforged Body state.

1243.TalentDes$chinese: 光铸身躯状态下，获得5%光元素加成。
1243.TalentDes$english: Gain 5% Light bonus while in Lightforged Body state.

1244.TalentDes$chinese: 施放终极技能后的10秒内，格挡几率+30%。
1244.TalentDes$english: For 10s after Casting Ultimate, block chance +30%.

1245.TalentDes$chinese: 英勇盾击造成暴击伤害时，回复120%攻击力生命值。
1245.TalentDes$english: Valor Bash restores 120% ATK as HP when it deals Crit DMG.

1247.TalentDes$chinese: 神圣之击造成伤害力量+2%，持续10秒，最多叠加5层。

1251.TalentDes$english: Special Attack and damage-focused Expertise are enhanced based on lost HP, with damage increasing by 1% for every 1% of HP lost.

冷酷征伐范围+100%。
冷酷征伐持续期间，悍勇无畏效果翻倍。

Zeal Crusade range +100%.
During Zeal Crusade, the effect of Indomitable Courage is doubled.

圣剑、裁决造成伤害时有10%固定几率使先锋打击派生为先锋追击。

Sacred Blade and Judgment have a fixed 10% chance to trigger Vanguard Hunt when dealing damage.

先锋追击可获得光芒核心。
重复获得光芒核心，缩减其2秒爆发时间。
1254.TalentDes$english:
Vanguard Hunt can obtain Radiant Core.
Repeatedly obtaining Radiant Core reduces its burst time by 2s.

1255.TalentDes$chinese: 冷酷征伐持续期间先锋打击派生为先锋追击。
1255.TalentDes$english: During Zeal Crusade, Vanguard Strike triggers Vanguard Hunt.

1256.TalentDes$english: Sacred Blade and Judgment have a fixed 10% increased chance to trigger Vanguard Hunt when dealing damage to targets with a lower percentage of HP than yourself.

1257.TalentDes$chinese: 每消耗100点光明能量，冷酷征伐剩余冷却时间缩减1秒。

1258.TalentDes$english: Judgment causes the target to suffer double the effect of Holy Mark for the next 5s when dealing damage.

1259.TalentDes$chinese: 自身处于圣环内时，受到所有伤害-10%。
1259.TalentDes$english: When within the Divine Circle, all damage taken -10%.

1260.TalentDes$chinese: 每拥有1层光铸屏障，裁决获得5%治疗加成。
1260.TalentDes$english: For each stack of Lightforged Barrier, Judgment gains a 5% healing bonus.

1262.TalentDes$english: When overflow healing applied by yourself accumulates to 10% of Max HP, gain 1 stack of Lightforged Barrier.

1263.TalentDes$chinese: 光铸身躯状态下，获得12%治疗加成。
1263.TalentDes$english: Gain 12% healing bonus while in Lightforged Body state.

1264.TalentDes$chinese: 光铸身躯状态下，获得5%光元素加成。
1264.TalentDes$english: Gain 5% Light bonus while in Lightforged Body state.

1266.TalentDes$chinese: 圣环附带光晕效果，每次造成伤害时眩晕敌方目标0.5秒。
1266.TalentDes$english: The Divine Circle comes with a halo effect, stunning the enemy target for 0.5s each time it deals damage.

1300.TalentDes$chinese:
当鸣奏技能激活时，每秒有15%固定几率获得热情迸发效果。

When Melody is active, there is a 15% fixed chance per second to gain Passion Surge.

1302.TalentDes$chinese: 当鸣奏技能激活时，每过1秒，热情迸发的触发几率额外+3%，最高额外+30%。
1302.TalentDes$english: When Melody is activated, the trigger chance for Passion Surge +an extra 3% every 1s (up to 30%).

1303.TalentDes$chinese: 每<style="accent-gn">10</style>点智力提供<style="accent-gn">1</style>点魔法攻击力。
1303.TalentDes$english: Every <style="accent-gn">10</style> points of Intellect provides <style="accent-gn">1</style> point of MATK.

1304.TalentDes$chinese: 特殊攻击消耗的演奏热情-1。

1308.TalentDes$chinese: 处于烈焰狂想中时，你的幸运几率翻倍。
1308.TalentDes$english: While in Rhapsody of Flame, your Luck chance is doubled.

1309.TalentDes$chinese: 专精技能、增幅节拍触发幸运一击时获得1个音浪值。

烈焰狂想始终以最强形态出现。

Rhapsody of Flame always appears in its most powerful form.
While in Rhapsody of Flame, healing +20%.

每造成一次10倍攻击力的伤害，获得1点音浪值。
消耗演奏热情将发射烈火球，同时清除所有音浪值，每1点音浪值提升烈火球20%伤害。

Gains 1 Soundwave Energy each time you deal DMG equal to 10 times ATK.

普通攻击变为二连击。

Basic Attacks become a two-hit combo.

1314.TalentDes$english: Stores excess Healing (up to 500% of Max HP). After activating Heroic Melody, consumes stored Healing to recover allies' HP every 1s, up to 15% of Max HP per second.

1315.TalentDes$chinese:
处于烈焰狂想中时，增幅节拍攻击次数+1。

While in Rhapsody of Flame, your Amplified Beat attack count +1.
While in Rhapsody of Flame, each hit of Harmonic Anthem also heals 1 ally with the lowest HP.

1316.TalentDes$chinese: 伤害型专精技能触发幸运一击时（命中多个目标时只触发一次），使得烈焰狂想立即冷却结束，同时在接下来10秒内施放烈焰狂想不消耗演奏热情。

1318.TalentDes$english: When Healing Beat or Passion Burst applies Crit Healing or deals Crit DMG (triggers only once when hitting multiple targets), gains 1 Performance Passion.

1319.TalentDes$chinese: 愈合节拍对受到鸣奏·愈合乐章影响的目标额外造成一次治疗。
1319.TalentDes$english: Healing Beat provides an additional Healing to targets under the influence of Healing Melody.

1321.TalentDes$chinese:
愈合节拍暴击几率+10%。
愈合节拍治疗强度+10%。
1321.TalentDes$english:
Healing Beat Crit Rate +10%.
Healing Beat Healing +10%.

1322.TalentDes$chinese: 每1%暴击几率提供1%安可琴弦触发几率。
1322.TalentDes$english: Every 1% Crit Rate grants 1% trigger chance for Encore Strings.

1323.TalentDes$chinese: 每消耗10个演奏热情，接下来10秒内热情挥洒将强化为激昂·热情挥洒。
1323.TalentDes$english: For each 10 Performance Passion consumed, enhances Passion Burst to Passion Fury for 10s.

1325.TalentDes$english: When each Passion Burst Healing crits, doubles the buffs that Healing Melody provides to allies.

1326.TalentDes$chinese: 攻击精英及以上目标时火元素加成+8%。

1330.TalentDes$chinese: <style="accent-gn">终极技能</style><linktext=1579><style="ItemQuality_5">升格·劲爆全场</style></linktext>替换成<linktext=1613><style="ItemQuality_5">升格·巡演曲</style></linktext>。

1331.TalentDes$english: When Encore Strings triggers, it activates a second time on the same target.

1332.TalentDes$chinese: 智力达到500时，演奏能量上限+20%。
1332.TalentDes$english: When Intellect reaches 500, the Performance Energy cap +20%.

1333.TalentDes$chinese:
激活近战流时，生命上限+20%。
激活远程流时，普通攻击变为远程攻击。
1333.TalentDes$english:
Activating Melee Specialization increases Max HP by 20%.
When Ranged Specialization is activated, Basic Attacks become ranged attacks.

1336.TalentDes$english: While Heroic Melody is active, grants Super Armor, increases DMG Reduction by 25%, and boosts movement speed by 10%.

1337.TalentDes$chinese: 猛烈挥击命中目标回复3点演奏能量，每多命中1个目标额外回复1点演奏能量，总计回复最多不超过10点。

1338.TalentDes$english: Every 1% Luck grants 2% Lucky Strike DMG Multiplier.

1340.TalentDes$chinese: 专精技能造成伤害时（命中多个目标时只触发一次），为拥有音符的目标造成额外治疗。
1340.TalentDes$english: When Expertise deal DMG (only triggers once when hitting multiple targets), heal targets with Note.

1341.TalentDes$chinese: 造成伤害转化的治疗量，对受到音符影响的目标其转化效率+20%。
1341.TalentDes$english: Converted healing from DMG +20% for targets affected by Note.

1344.TalentDes$english: Within 10s of casting Encore, each use of Rhapsody of Flame causes targets affected by Encore to trigger Encore Strings.

自身永久携带安可效果。
自身每触发5次安可琴弦，下一次增幅节拍、聚合乐章伤害+50%。

Permanently benefits from Encore effect.

1346.TalentDes$chinese: 每1%幸运几率提供1%安可琴弦触发几率。
1346.TalentDes$english: Every 1% Luck Chance grants 1% more trigger chance for Encore Strings.

1347.TalentDes$chinese: 安可琴弦造成的幸运一击伤害和幸运一击治疗+50%。
1347.TalentDes$english: Encore Strings' Lucky Strike DMG and healing +50%.

1348.TalentDes$chinese: 使用万众瞩目后强化的技能个数从初始的1个变为2个。
1348.TalentDes$english: The number of enhanced skills granted after using Center Stage increases from 1 to 2.

1349.TalentDes$chinese:
万众瞩目充能次数+1。
每消耗50个演奏热情，获得1层万众瞩目充能。
1349.TalentDes$english:
Center Stage charge +1.
For every 50 Performance Passion consumed, gain 1 Center Stage charge.

1350.TalentDes$english: Casting Center Stage immediately extends Heroic Melody by 5s.

1351.TalentDes$chinese: 施放万众瞩目可立即获得15点音浪值，且接下来10秒时间内获得的音浪值翻倍。

激涌五重奏造成暴击伤害或治疗时（命中多个目标时只触发一次），获得2点演奏能量。
鸣奏·愈合乐章造成暴击时，获得1点演奏能量（命中多个目标时只触发一次）。
1352.TalentDes$english:
Fivefold Crescendo deals Crit DMG or healing (only triggers once for multiple targets), and grants 2 Performance Energy.

1353.TalentDes$chinese: 音箱每隔5秒，发出一记火焰震击。

1354.TalentDes$chinese: 热情挥洒每多命中1个目标伤害+5%，最高不超过25%。

1355.TalentDes$english: When Passion Burst hits a speaker, it immediately releases a Flame Shock.

1356.TalentDes$chinese: 鸣奏·愈合乐章激活时，激涌五重奏附带伤害效果。
1356.TalentDes$english: While Healing Melody is active, Fivefold Crescendo gains a DMG effect.

1357.TalentDes$chinese: 音箱触发的专精技能其伤害和治疗效果+30%。
1357.TalentDes$english: Expertise triggered by the speaker gain 30% more DMG and healing.

1358.TalentDes$chinese: 鸣奏·愈合乐章每持续1秒，治疗强度+2%，最高叠加5层。
1358.TalentDes$english: Per second Healing Melody remains active, its Healing +2%, stacking up to 5 times.

1359.TalentDes$chinese:
对生命值大于50%的敌方目标暴击+10%。
对生命值低于50%的友方目标暴击+10%。
1359.TalentDes$english:
Crit +10% against enemies above 50% HP.
Crit +10% against enemies below 50% HP.

1360.TalentDes$chinese: 对受到鸣奏·愈合乐章影响的目标治疗强度+10%。
1360.TalentDes$english: Increases Healing by 10% for targets affected by Healing Melody.

1361.TalentDes$chinese: 造成伤害的7%和造成治疗的15%将存储为律动。施放万众瞩目后的10秒内，施放专精技能、愈合节拍都会消耗律动造成40%额外治疗。
1361.TalentDes$english: 7% of DMG dealt and 15% of healing done is stored as Rhythm. Within 10s of casting Center Stage, the use of Expertise and Healing Beat consumes Rhythm to grant 40% bonus healing.

1362.TalentDes$chinese: 施放安可后的10秒内，每次施放专精技能，使得受到安可作用的目标立即触发安可琴弦。
1362.TalentDes$english: Within 10s of casting Encore, each use of Expertise Skill triggers Encore Strings for targets affected by Encore.

1363.TalentDes$chinese:
自身永久携带安可效果。
自身每触发5次安可琴弦，减少所有专精技能剩余冷却时间5秒。
1363.TalentDes$english:
Permanently benefits from Encore effect.
Every 5 triggers of Encore Strings reduce the remaining CD of Expertise by 5s.

1364.TalentDes$chinese: 开启安可之后，鸣奏·愈合乐章提供的属性增益效果+100%。
1364.TalentDes$english: While Encore is active, boosts from Healing Melody increase by 100%.

1365.TalentDes$chinese:
万众瞩目充能次数+1。
每消耗50个演奏热情，获得1层万众瞩目充能。
1365.TalentDes$english:
Center Stage charge +1.
For every 50 Performance Passion consumed, gain 1 Center Stage charge.

1366.TalentDes$chinese: 使用万众瞩目后强化的技能个数从初始的1个变为2个。
1366.TalentDes$english: The number of enhanced skills granted after using Center Stage increases from 1 to 2.

1367.TalentDes$chinese: 施放万众瞩目后，召唤一股音符热浪。
1367.TalentDes$english: After casting Center Stage, summons a wave of Sonic Surge.
